description:
Famous among fans thanks to its lightweight texture, oh-so relaxed feel, and the bacteria-resistant performance of hemp, our bestselling Vaha collection is the ultimate do-everything wear. And the Vaha Pant for men is no exception.

Perfect for long days lounging round the house (maybe with a little yoga thrown in), this pant delivers on a promise of comfort and performance, softness and strength.
name: Prana Vaha Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens
